name: Loaded Die (TheGoose)
description:
Created in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 game jam on the theme "Roll of the Dice".

"Each of your bullets will roll a die for damage
Spawned enemies will roll a die for health  
When you run out of ammo, you will die
Deal exact damage to get a bullet back"

Music by djank of Bird Problems

Free assets used:

"FPS Integration Tool" by Grey Gear Systems
"Dice d6 game ready PBR" by Armor and Rum
"Free 2D Mega Pack" by Brackeys
"Halloween Cemetery Set" by 3DFancy
